entities.name: SingleStore Client
entities.description: A package designed for interacting with the SingleStore API in Node.js environments.

entities.name: SingleStore API
entities.description: API provided by SingleStore for database management and interaction.

entities.name: Node.js
entities.description: A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.

entities.name: API key
entities.description: A unique identifier used to authenticate a user, developer, or calling program to an API.

entities.name: OpenAI
entities.description: An AI research and deployment company.

entities.name: @singlestore/ai
entities.description: A package for integrating custom LLMs with SingleStore.

entities.name: workspaceGroup.get
entities.description: A method to get workspace groups with options.

entities.name: workspace group
entities.description: A group of workspaces managed within SingleStore.

relationships.description: The SingleStore Client is designed for interacting with the SingleStore API.
The SingleStore Client operates in Node.js environments.
The SingleStore Client provides access to the Management API.
The SingleStore Client supports AI integration.
The SingleStore Client utilizes an API key for certain functionalities.
The SingleStore Client can use the @singlestore/ai package for custom LLM integration.
The workspaceGroup.get method is used to manage workspace groups.
